benchmark_details.name: SCALEFeedback (Synthetic Computer Science Assignments for LLM-generated Educational Feedback Research)
benchmark_details.overview: SCALEFeedback is a large-scale dataset of synthetic student assignments generated using a sophisticated assignment mimicry framework, intended for research on LLM-generated educational feedback.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate research on generalizable methods for automated educational feedback using LLM-generated data.

data.source: Real-world dataset retrieved from a computer science school in an anonymous university.
data.annotation: Synthetic data generated using a one-to-one LLM-based imitation method.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated to evaluate semantic similarity and the resemblance of synthetic submissions to real assignments.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better fidelity and similarity to real submissions.
methodology.validation: The dataset evaluated against baseline naive mimicry methods.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The framework ensures perfect protection of student private information through privacy mechanisms.
